title: softwarecentric
extract: Software-Led Infrastructure: The Evolution of Software-Centric IT Operations. ... Pervasive virtualization across compute, storage, and networking technologies means that the point of control for the datacenter will exist in software, not hardware components.Feb 14, 2013
extract_html: Software-Led Infrastructure: The Evolution of Software-Centric IT Operations. ... Pervasive virtualization across compute, storage, and networking technologies means that the point of control for the datacenter will exist in software, not hardware components.Feb 14, 2013
